title: Lana Del Rey discography
summary: American singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey has released eight studio albums, four extended plays (EPs), 38 singles (including four as a featured artist) and 16 promotional singles. According to Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA), Del Rey has sold 32 million singles and 5.5 million albums in the United States.[1] Billboard rank her as the 37th Top Rock Artist of the 2010s.[2] Del Rey has also sold 7.1Â million singles units in United Kingdom.[3]
